DOC.criteria: Preop : Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 40 kg/m2 BMI ≥ 35 kg/m2 associate comorbidities . Age > 18 year Postop : Patients underwent surgery ≥ 12 month Head Surgeon Gastrocirurgia de Brasilia Clinic ; Patients age > 65 year . Severe heart and/or respiratory problem ; Pregnant woman .
